name: New Media Senior Project
description: Students develop a new media project that furthers their research into theoretical issues around digital media practices and artefacts. Projects may focus on digital media ranging from the internet to gaming, to social networking and the Web, to CD-ROMS, DVDs, mobile apps, and Virtual and Augmented Reality technologies.
prerequisites: Completion of 15 credits including Centennial College courses listed in New Media Group 1 & New Media Group 2
